Title: Getting Started with GraphQL in .NET
Description:

Hello, everybody. I'm Nick, and in this video, Michael Staib will show you how to get started with GraphQL using HotChocolate. HotChocolate is the best way to create GraphQL APIs in .NET, and Michael Staib is its creator, so there is no better way to learn how to build GraphQL APIs.
